title: Manage a REMS Program
description: A product has a Risk Evaluation and Mitigation Strategy (REMS) program. An agent must verify that a physician is certified before a prescription can be dispensed.

tasks.description: Receive a request to authorize a prescription, including the physician's name and NPI number.
Check the physician's status in the REMS certification database.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent queries the database and confirms the physician is certified.

tasks.description: Provide an authorization code to the pharmacy to allow them to dispense the drug.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates and provides the authorization code.
